description.message: UpSignOn automatically fills forms with data saved in your UpSignOn desktop app.

app_report_issue.message: Autofill or autosave do not work on a website ? Please report it to contact@upsignon.eu.

popup_account_pwd_medium.message: This password is not strong enough or not unique. You should change it!

popup_account_pwd_weak.message: This password is very weak of reused many times. It's urgent you change it!

popup_account_pwd_unknown.message: The strength of this password could not be estimated.

popup_account_autofill_and_save.message: Save the url in this account and fill in current tab.

content_script_insecure_page.message: Warning, this page is not secure!

content_script_create_item_title.message: Create an account in the vault:

content_script_should_autosave_by_defaul.message: Deactivate autosaving by default on this website

content_script_untrusted_explanation.message: Try forcing autofill from the extension's popup (in the browser's action bar).

matching_not_owned_account_warning.message: Note that there exists a shared account for this website for which you do not have write access.

app_connection_setup_details.message: This extension needs to communicate with your UpSignOn desktop app.

app_connection_setup_download_link_text.message: Download the desktop app for free if you don't already have it

app_connection_setup_button.message: Configure the extension within the app

app_connection_setup_step2_alt.message: If this does not work, use this

app_connection_setup_copy_code.message: Copy the code displayed by the app

app_connection_setup_copy_code_websocket.message: The app is not started or crashed!

app_connection_error_details.message: Are you sure UpSignOn is running? Note that it is sometimes necessary to wait a few seconds after the app has started.

app_connection_error_resetup_part_1.message: If after starting the app, you still see this error page, you can

app_connection_error_resetup_part_3.message: to start the configuration of the extension over.

passwords_not_saved_title.message: The following password have not been saved and will be lost if you quit your browser!

passwords_not_saved_explanation.message:
A password appears here in 2 cases:
1/ You never submitted the form.
2/ You submitted the form but we could not detect it.

passwords_not_saved_create_error.message:
THE CREATION OF THE ACCOUNT HAS FAILED!

Make sure you have unlocked your vault.

app_connection_alternative_method_2.message: Navigate to the settings page (star wheel) > Filling in browsers.

app_connection_alternative_method_3.message: Click on the "Add a browser extension (alternative method)" button.

app_connection_alternative_method_4.message: Copy the key displayed in the app here.
